required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic and Safety Study of LY03004 in Stable Patients With Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Single Ascending Dose Pharmacokinetic and Safety Study of LY03004 Following Escalating Single Intramuscular Injection in Stable Patients With Schizophrenia or Schizoaffective Disorder

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to characterize the pharmacokinetics (PK) of LY03004 following an escalating single intramuscular injection at 12.5, 25, 37.5, or 50 mg; and to evaluate the safety and tolerability and preliminary efficacy of LY03004 following intramuscular injection.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax for the Pharmacokinetics (PK) of LY03004

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
The change of the PANSS score for the Preliminary efficacy of LY03004

facility.name: Neuropsychiatric Research Center of Orange County
